logo.name: Settlers of Catan Logo
logo.description: The official logo for Settlers of Catan Game Manager featuring hexagonal tiles and resource icons.

sections.title: Build, Trade, Win - Manage Your Catan Games with Ease
sections.subtitle: The ultimate tool for Settlers of Catan enthusiasts
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: **Get ready to elevate your Catan experience** with our comprehensive management tool! Track resources, manage trades, and keep scores all in one intuitive interface. Ready to enhance your game night? Let's get started!

images.name: Catan Hero Image
images.description: A captivating image of a Settlers of Catan board with cities, roads, and resource cards.

sections.title: About Settlers of Catan Game Manager
sections.name: About Section
sections.label: About
sections.content: Our game manager is designed for Catan fans by Catan fans. **We know the thrill of building settlements, trading resources, and competing for longest road**. Our mission is to simplify game management so you can focus on strategy and fun.

images.name: Vintage Catan Board
images.description: An intricate illustration showing the classical setup of a Catan board, adding an authentic touch to the about section.

sections.title: Enhance Your Gameplay with Our Management Tools
sections.subtitle: Key Features of Our Services
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Resource Tracker:** Manage and track all your resources seamlessly.  
- **Trade Manager:** Keep tabs on all your trades with ease.  
- **Scoreboard:** Automatic calculation of scores without interruption.  
- **Player Stats:** See analytics on player performance over time.

images.name: Services Overview
images.description: An infographic displaying icons for the key features: resource tracker, trade manager, scoreboard, and player stats.

sections.title: Join Our Community
sections.subtitle: Connect with Other Catan Enthusiasts
sections.name: Community Section
sections.label: Community
sections.content:
Explore strategies, share your game stories, and connect with other players in our thriving community. 

- **Forum:** Exchange strategies and tips.
- **Events:** Join tournaments and meetups.
- **Blog:** Learn from articles and guides.

images.name: Community Forum
images.description: Thumbnail image of a bustling online forum with players sharing tips and strategies.

sections.title: What Our Users Say
sections.subtitle: Testimonials from Catan Enthusiasts
sections.name: Testimonials Section
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
*"The Catan Game Manager is a game-changer! It keeps everything organized and lets us focus on playing."*  
– Alex K.  

*"I love the statistics feature. It's fun to see my progression over games!"*  
– Jamie L.

images.name: User Headshot Jamie
images.description: Another happy player enjoying the benefits of the Catan Game Manager.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help

sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Have questions or need support? Reach out to our friendly team at:

- **Email:** support@catangamemanager.com
- **Phone:** 1-800-CATAN-GM
- **Address:** 123 Catan Avenue, Settlers City, CAT 12345
